description: The Office of the Superintendent of Financial Institutions has a requirement for the purchase, delivery and installation of office furniture to the following locations by February 2023 (estimated):
full_summary:
[Heritage style font](https://www.addontop.com/font/heritage/)
# Government Tender Announcement

### Height Adjustable Work Surfaces and Storage Lockers

A competitive tendering opportunity is available for the purchase, delivery, and installation of office furniture to various locations across Canada.

## Tender Details

*   **Tender Reference:** PW-22-01012074
*   **Amendment Number:** 4
*   **Solicitation Number:** 20221441
*   **Publication Date:** November 1, 2022
*   **Tender Closing Date:** November 25, 2022, at 2:00 PM EST
*   **Amendment Date:** November 23, 2022

## Supply Details

*   **Goods and Services Identification Number (GSIN):** N7110
*   **GSIN Description:** Office Furniture
*   **Procurement Category:** Government Department
*   **Procurement Method:** Competitive – Selective Tendering
*   **Notice Type:** Request for Proposal
*   **Trade Agreements:** Set-Aside Program for Aboriginal Business (SPAB)

## Tender Description

This tender opportunity is issued pursuant to the Public Services and Procurement Canada (PSPC) Supply Arrangement (SA) # E60PQ-140003/C. The successful bidder will be required to provide height-adjustable work surfaces and storage lockers for a minimum of 100 units, with installation to take place at various locations across Canada, including, but not limited to, Ottawa, Toronto, Montreal, and Vancouver, by February 2023. Interested bidders must be registered on the Supplier Registration website and providers of SAEA certified products.

## Contact Details

For further information, please contact:

*   **Name:** Himani Joshi
*   **Email:** [himani.joshi@osfi-bsif.gc.ca](mailto:himani.joshi@osfi-bsif.gc.ca)
*   **Phone:** (Can be provided upon request)

## Supplier Registration

To access tender documents and participate in the bidding process, please register with the Supplier Registration website and verify that your profile is up-to-date before the deadline. Note that no conditional bids will be accepted. Bidders are advised to review the relevant section of the PSPC website for full information on this tender opportunity.
